node.title: Check-in: why am I doing this, again?
node.excerpt: My gardening motives over the last 5 years: Five years ago: Food Forest omg omg grow all the foods eat the plants!! And native plants, grow all the natives!!!1! Four years ago: I’m not really sure I want to grow kiwis. Tomatoes are not very pretty plants. Oh well, have to grow em. Watering is […]
